name: BaseEventRegistry
description: Core event management system in JSMacros that handles all event registration, listener management, and event metadata.
overview:
BaseEventRegistry is the core event management system in JSMacros that handles all event registration, listener management, and event metadata. This class serves as the foundation for JSMacros' event-driven architecture, managing how events are registered, which listeners respond to them, and how script triggers are processed.

It is responsible for Event Registration, Listener Management, Script Trigger Management, Event Metadata, and Legacy Support.

methods.name: addListener
methods.description: Adds an event listener for a specific event.

parameters.name: event
parameters.description: The event name to listen for

methods.name: removeListener
methods.description: Removes a specific event listener. Returns true if listener was removed, false if not found.

methods.name: getListeners
methods.description: Returns all listeners for all events.

methods.name: getListeners
methods.description: Returns all listeners for a specific event.

methods.name: addScriptTrigger
methods.description: Adds a script trigger from configuration to the event system. (Abstract method)

methods.name: removeScriptTrigger
methods.description: Removes a script trigger from the event system. (Abstract method)

methods.name: getScriptTriggers
methods.description: Gets all currently registered script triggers. (Abstract method)

methods.name: addEvent
methods.description: Registers a new event with the system. Marked as Internal.

parameters.name: eventName
parameters.description: Name of the event to register

methods.name: addEvent
methods.description: Registers an event with joinable flag.

parameters.name: joinable
parameters.description: Whether the event can be joined

methods.name: addEvent
methods.signature: addEvent(String eventName, boolean joinable, boolean cancellable)
methods.description: Registers an event with both joinable and cancellable flags.

parameters.name: joinable
parameters.description: Whether the event can be joined

parameters.name: cancellable
parameters.description: Whether the event can be cancelled

methods.name: addEvent
methods.description: Registers an event using reflection and @Event annotation. Automatically extracts event metadata.

methods.name: clearMacros
methods.description: Removes all script-based listeners while keeping system listeners intact.
